channel.title: Comments on: Who remembers this Fan Promotion?

item.title: By: stereofailure
item.dc:creator: stereofailure
item.description: Who's the guy with his hand on his heart? I recognize everyone else (except maybe the second guy from the left who looks like Master Chief in Assassin's Creed clothes.).
item.content:encoded: Who’s the guy with his hand on his heart? I recognize everyone else (except maybe the second guy from the left who looks like Master Chief in Assassin’s Creed clothes.).

item.title: By: BLU3DR4GON-E-D
item.dc:creator: BLU3DR4GON-E-D
item.description:
Its neat and all but no Cole MacGrath? But the new boy with useless powers if he can't find a container of angel dust. Or kratos? Ratchet and Clank? Jak and Daxter?
I see the blades of chaos and the infamous karma bird on the frame.
item.content:encoded:
Its neat and all but no Cole MacGrath? But the new boy with useless powers if he can’t find a container of angel dust.
Or kratos? Ratchet and Clank? Jak and Daxter?

I see the blades of chaos and the infamous karma bird on the frame.
